title: Draftkings not recognizing current location, only on firefox browser.
content:
I have used Firefox for browsing for over 20 years. I have not had an issue with draft kings and location at all until now. Other browsers work and my phone android on the draftkings app work as well. i have already exhausted draftkings support as it is workable with micro soft edge and chrome. However i am unable to get it to work on Firefox Which i would prefer.

any suggestions. thanks
creator: jimmyjvvegas
